name: Terrible Teeth
storyline: Cornelius is the cream of the crop, the most heroic of all the kernels of corn. His field has been terrorised by a ravenous radioactive monster and all the corn has become trapped inside his mouth! Help Cornelius save his buddies from certain doom! Use simple touch controls and your quick reflexes to control Cornelius. Run, jump, dodge and duck to avoid peril but be warned, the mouth is riddled with hazards and the entire environment is alive and trying to take you down!
summary:
Prepare for an adventure with bite... 9 out of 10 dentists recommend Terrible Teeth!

Terrible Teeth is an action arcade mobile game from Vile Media LLC. Play as Cornelius, a heroic kernel of corn trying to save his friends from certain doom!
